problem_info.title: 3388. Count Beautiful Splits in an Array
test_examples: Example 1: Input: nums = [1,1,2,1] Output: 2 Explanation: The beautiful splits are: A split with nums1 = [1], nums2 = [1,2], nums3 = [1]. A split with nums1 = [1], nums2 = [1], nums3 = [2,1].
Example 2: Input: nums = [1,2,3,4] Output: 0 Explanation: There are 0 beautiful splits.
